title: Ticket #27: Fix example config files to reflect that vanilla is the default
description: The condor 7.2.0 release notes indicate that the default universe was changed from Standard to Vanilla. However, the example config files released with 7.2.0 still indicate the previous default (standard). Also the Manual still incorrectly states in several places (such as the condor_submit man page) that Standard Universe is the default. Someone needs to grep through the manual and fix this.
remarks:
2009-Jan-16 08:34:44 by tannenba:
I fixed the config files. Since Matt added the feature, I'll let him make the Manual updates. :)

2009-Jan-16 10:56:04 by matt:
I updated the condor_submit man page on the 7.2.0 branch
check_ins: 2009-Jan-16 08:31   Check-in [13498]: Fix same config files to reflect vanilla as the default universe. (#27) (By Todd Tannenbaum )
creator: tannenba
